Uses of ASR in sandra.examples.asr.asrwithlib
 

Subclasses of ASR in sandra.examples.asr.asrwithlib
 class ASRWithLib
          ASRWithLib: Basic app with ASR using the ASRLib Simple demo in which the user speaks and the recognition results are showed in a list along with their confidence values
 

Uses of ASR in sandra.examples.formfill.musicbrain
 

Subclasses of ASR in sandra.examples.formfill.musicbrain
 class MusicBrain
          MusicBrain: App that engages in a form-filling dialog in which the user provides a word, and a start and end date, and the app shows a list of all music albums in the MusicBrainZ database that contain the word in the title and were released between the dates provided It uses the ASRLib and TTSLib libraries for speech recognition and synthesis, and the FormFillLib for dialog management.
 

Uses of ASR in sandra.examples.multimodal.sendmessage
 

Subclasses of ASR in sandra.examples.multimodal.sendmessage
 class SendMessage
          SendMessage: App that allows to provide several pieces of data using both the oral and visual modalities.
 

Uses of ASR in sandra.examples.nlu.grammartest
 

Subclasses of ASR in sandra.examples.nlu.grammartest
 class GrammarTest
          GrammarTest: Application to test the possibilities for natural language processing of the NLULib.
 

Uses of ASR in sandra.examples.oneshot.voicelaunch
 

Subclasses of ASR in sandra.examples.oneshot.voicelaunch
 class VoiceLaunch
          VoiceLaunch: it launches the app mentioned by the user It uses the ASRLib and TTSLib libraries for speech recognition, as well a library from Apache commons: http://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-codec/index.html
 

Uses of ASR in sandra.examples.oneshot.voicesearch
 

Subclasses of ASR in sandra.examples.oneshot.voicesearch
 class VoiceSearch
          VoiceSearch: initiates a search query based on the words spoken by the user.

 class VoiceSearchConfirmation
          VoiceSearch: initiates a search query based on the words spoken by the user.
 

Uses of ASR in sandra.examples.vpa.derek
 

Subclasses of ASR in sandra.examples.vpa.derek
 class Derek
          DEREK: Derek is a specialized VPA which knowledge base is encoded in AIML as a set of question-response pairs, similar to FAQs.
 

Uses of ASR in sandra.examples.vpa.jack
 

Subclasses of ASR in sandra.examples.vpa.jack
 class Jack
          JACK: Jack is a general-purpose VPA which knowledge base is encoded in AIML.

 class Stacy
          STACY: Stacy is a general-purpose VPA which knowledge base is encoded in AIML.
 

Uses of ASR in sandra.libs.dm.multimodalformfilllib
 

Subclasses of ASR in sandra.libs.dm.multimodalformfilllib
 class DialogInterpreter
          Dialog manager that follows a form-filling approach and synchronizes the values recognized with the corresponding elements in the GUI It is a version of the class sandra.libs.dm.formfilllib.DialogInterpreter (chapter 5, FormFillLib project).
 class MultimodalDialogInterpreter
          Interprets a multimodal dialog in which the oral and visual modalities are synchronized.
 

Uses of ASR in sandra.libs.nlu.nlulib
 

Subclasses of ASR in sandra.libs.nlu.nlulib
 class NLU
          Processes the output of the speech recognizer either with a statistical or a handcrafted grammar obtaining its semantic interpretation.
